Input.name: NL
Input.description: Number of soil layers

Input.name: ISWWAT
Input.description: Water simulation control switch

Input.name: BD
Input.description: Bulk density, soil layer NL

Input.name: DLAYR
Input.description: Thickness of soil layer L

Input.name: DS
Input.description: Cumulative depth in soil layer L

Input.name: DUL
Input.description: Volumetric soil water content at Drained Upper Limit in soil layer L

Input.name: LL
Input.description: Volumetric soil water content in soil layer L at lower limit

Input.name: NLAYR
Input.description: Actual number of soil layers

Input.name: MSALB
Input.description: Soil albedo with mulch and soil water effects

Input.name: SRAD
Input.description: Solar radiation

Input.name: SW
Input.description: Volumetric soil water content in layer L

Input.name: TAVG
Input.description: Average daily temperature

Input.name: TMAX
Input.description: Maximum daily temperature

Input.name: TAV
Input.description: Average annual soil temperature, used with TAMP to calculate soil temperature.

Input.name: TAMP
Input.description: Amplitude of temperature function used to calculate soil temperatures

Input.name: CUMDPT
Input.description: Cumulative depth of soil profile

Input.name: DSMID
Input.description: Depth to midpoint of soil layer L

Input.name: TMA
Input.description: Array of previous 5 days of average soil temperatures

Input.name: ATOT
Input.description: Sum of TMA array (last 5 days soil temperature)

Input.name: SRFTEMP
Input.description: Temperature of soil surface litter

Input.name: ST
Input.description: Soil temperature in soil layer L

Input.name: DOY
Input.description: Current day of simulation

Output.name: DSMID
Output.description: Depth to midpoint of soil layer L

Output.name: TMA
Output.description: Array of previous 5 days of average soil temperatures

Output.name: ATOT
Output.description: Sum of TMA array (last 5 days soil temperature)

Output.name: ST
Output.description: Soil temperature in soil layer L
